content: This is because with the Deathstinger Soak equipped, using the gourd will inflict the Poisoned state on the Destined One, slowly dealing damage to you.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Deathstinger_(Soak).md', within the main section titled 'Deathstinger (Soak)'.
The content is as follows:
This is because with the Deathstinger Soak equipped, using the gourd will inflict the Poisoned state on the Destined One, slowly dealing damage to you.
